sentences.en: Argentina need to beat Peru by at least four goals to overhaul Brazil and reach the final itself.
sentences.cn: 阿根廷队至少要赢秘鲁队4球才能超越巴西队进入决赛。

sentences.en: By the computer, people from China to Peru can see each other.
sentences.cn: 通过电脑我们可以看见大洋彼岸的人.

sentences.en: Ecuador lies between Columbia, Peru, and the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.cn: 厄瓜多尔位于哥伦比亚 、 秘鲁和太平洋之间.

sentences.en: For over 60 years, they have performed the folk music of Peru.
sentences.cn: 他们演奏秘鲁民间音乐已经有60多年了.

sentences.en: Happiness from China to Peru when the cheering news came.
sentences.cn: 这个令人振奋的消息传来后,一片欢乐景象.

sentences.en: I thank the Congress approving a good agreement with Peru.
sentences.cn: 我感谢国会批准了与秘鲁签定的好协定.

sentences.en: In 1987, Garcia introduced legislation to nationalize Peru's banking and financial systems.
sentences.cn: 1987年，加西亚立法将秘鲁银行业和金融系统收归国有。

sentences.en: In Peru, a cholera outbreak continues to spread.
sentences.cn: 霍乱在秘鲁各地相继爆发。

sentences.en: It sounds as though you enjoyed Peru.
sentences.cn: 这听起来好像你喜欢秘鲁。

sentences.en: Its distribution encompasses moistly seasonally dry forest in coastal Ecuador and Peru.
sentences.cn: 其分布地区包括了厄瓜多尔和秘鲁海岸的潮湿的、季节性干燥的森林.

sentences.en: On Bol & # 237 ; var's orders, Sucre liberated Upper Peru ( 1825 ).
sentences.cn: 根据玻利瓦尔的命令, 1825年苏克雷解放了上秘鲁.

sentences.en: Peru also adopted and basically the same as ISPM 15.
sentences.cn: 秘鲁也采纳了和ISPM15基本相同的规定.

sentences.en: Peru: Cuzco and Apur í mac and Huallaga rivers & Colombian border.
sentences.cn: 秘鲁: 库斯科,阿亚库乔地区,埃内河谷,阿普里马克省和瓦亚加河 和 哥伦比亚边境.

sentences.en: So the team looked at 50 sites from Costa Rica to Peru.
sentences.cn: 因此,该团队调查了从哥斯达黎加到秘鲁的50个地方.

sentences.en: They gave an insipid opening performance in a nil-nil draw with Peru.
sentences.cn: 他们与秘鲁队的揭幕战打得波澜不惊，最终以0：0战平。

sentences.en: Well, in Peru you had to negotiate like that to get the freshest fish at the market.
sentences.cn: 在秘鲁你必须这样还价你才能在市场上拿到最新鲜的鱼。

sentences.en: When the Peru business had first presented itself, it had not seemed an extraordinary opportunity.
sentences.cn: 秘鲁的这趟出差起初也不起眼, 不像是个什么了不起的机遇.
